name: react-grab-copilot
description: VS Code extension to expose Copilot as an agent server

chatParticipants.name: react-grab
chatParticipants.description: Ask React Grab Copilot for help

tools.name: react-grab-copilot.grabTaskCompleted
tools.description: Signal that the task is completed

requestId.description: The ID of the request that is completed

reactGrabCopilot.port.description: Port to listen on for the agent server

reactGrabCopilot.systemPrompt.description: Custom system prompt for the agent. Leave empty to use the default prompt.

reactGrabCopilot.useAgentsMd.description: Include AGENTS.md from workspace root in the system prompt context.

reactGrabCopilot.allowMcp.description: Allow the agent to use MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers configured in VS Code.

reactGrabCopilot.sendScreenshotToLLM.description: Send screenshots to the LLM for visual context. When disabled, screenshots are only shown in the chat.

reactGrabCopilot.logLevel.description: Log level for the extension output. DEBUG shows detailed LLM request/response information.

scripts.pack: pnpm run build && pnpm exec vsce package --no-dependencies
scripts.publish: pnpm run pack && pnpm exec vsce publish --no-dependencies
